title.rendered: Seattle WIT User Group June Event

content.rendered:
Join the amazing Salesforce women of Seattle to talk about the Summer ’16 release, your favorite ideas to vote for, and the ideas you have to increase Salesforce usability.  

Everyone is welcome Admins, End Users, Developers, Stakeholders, and anyone else that uses Salesforce in one way or another.  The location is TBD, but will be finalized by Tuesday.

I look forward to seeing you there!

Register on Eventbrite

@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group May 13th Happy Hour
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Are you a Salesforce woman in technology or a supporter of Salesforce women in technology? Are you located in the Greater Seattle area?  If you answered yes to both of the questions above, you should register for the Seattle Women in Tech User group Happy Hour on Friday, May 13th…

jetpack-related-posts.title: These Women Love Salesforce — and Have Tattoos to Prove It
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In 2017 my Ohana, Lauren Dunn, was visiting Seattle from Ireland, and what else would we do besides get Salesforce Tattoos!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Add Export Reports in Salesforce Lightning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Lightning and Classic users unite! Vote to add the ability to export reports in the new Lightning Experience.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Idea:  Enterprise Territory Mangement Rule Opportunity Filter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Just posted a new Idea, thanks to the Territory Management Group, to have the Run Opportunity Filter class button visible all the time on the territory hierarchy with help text to explain the button is only available to push when the model is active. Care to vote? https://success.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=08730000000oMVqAAM

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Recycling Bin
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Currently, if you are using the brand new "Lightning Experience" look of Salesforce, not all the functionality of Salesforce Classic is available. This isn't a bad thing, Lighting is new and alive, changing and growing based on the world today and the ideas and needs of the Salesforce Community. It…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ideas Worth a Look
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: One thing I love about Salesforce is the fact that they listen to their users regarding functionality needs and wants. The Salesforce IdeaExchange is full of great ideas. and when I come across a good one, i campaign for votes. Here are some of the goodies.
